attrs.script:
on afterKeyDown
	-- get the x,y coordinates
	put the left of cd btn "mr_fish" into x
	put the top of cd btn "mr_fish" into y
	
	-- change x and y depending on which key was pressed
	if keychar() is "ArrowLeft" then
		subtract 10 from x
	else if keychar() is "ArrowRight" then
		add 10 to x
	else if keychar() is "ArrowUp" then
		subtract 10 from y
	else if keychar() is "ArrowDown" then
		add 10 to y
	else
		exit afterKeyDown
	end if
	
	-- if you're holding down a key, don't keep moving
	if keyrepeated() then
		exit afterKeyDown
	end if
	
	set the left of cd btn "mr_fish" to x
	set the top of cd btn "mr_fish" to y
	
	-- check if you have won
	if isWithinPlanet(the loc of cd btn "mr_fish") then
		show cd fld "win"
	else
		hide cd fld "win"
	end if
end afterKeyDown

function isWithinPlanet coords
	-- returns true if the fish is at the planet
	put item 1 of coords into centerx
	put item 2 of coords into centery
	return centerx > the left of cd btn "planet" and \
		centerx < the right of cd btn "planet" and \
		centery > the top of cd btn "planet" and \
		centery < the bottom of cd btn "planet"
end isWithinPlanet

attrs.name: my field 17
attrs.ftxt:
geneva_18_biuosdceClick the Browse tool (looks like a hand)
then type arrow keys (up down left right)
to move Mr. Fish so that he can return to
his home planet.

attrs.name: my field 19
attrs.ftxt:
geneva_12_biuosdceSee and change the source code:
From Objects menu, click Card Info...
Then click the Script button in the lower right corner.
